import React, { useState } from 'react' import classnames from 'classnames'; import { Card, CardBody, CardHeader, Col, Row, TabContent, TabPane, Nav, NavItem, NavLink, Button, CardTitle, CardText } from 'reactstrap'; import T1 from './T1'; import T2 from './T2'; import T3 from './T3'; import T4 from './T4'; export default ({ account, historyMatchs }) => { const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState('1'); const toggle = tab => { if (activeTab !== tab) setActiveTab(tab); } return
Statistic Matchs
{ toggle('1'); }} > Win rates { toggle('2'); }} > Number of matches { toggle('3'); }} > Number of wins { toggle('4'); }} > Number of losing
}
